title: Windows 8.1 5in1 x64 en-US Oct2015 murphy78
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 8.1 5in1 x64 with Update Oct2015
This image contains Windows Updates current to Oct14-2015

No Windows 8.1 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Registry Settings were modified.
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO.

Tools used:
dism for Image Exports
oscdimg for ISO mastering
Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.1
Added Info folder to Windows Setup dir to annoy credit theives
murphy78 diskpart/apply script v1.2.8

Features:
-Resetbased starting images using preventpending to reduce release size
-NetFx 2-3.5.1 added to integration
-DaRT 8.1 integrated into boot.wim and winre.wim recovery options.
-Diskpart/apply script with recovery image and multi-boot support v1.2.8*
*To access, press shift-f10 during boot-setup and type: "MENU"
-UEFI and normal BIOS booting support.

Changes:
- Completely Re-integrated everything using the source files and omitted
the win10 upgrade and telemetry updates. I'll include a list of the current
ones being offered in a txt file, but future ones will likely pop up so you
might want to disable auto-updates until you know better if you want to
keep win8.1 and/or block telemetry (MS Spying)
- As a result, it seems that MS recently updated their servers to stop
offering previous month rollups, so size has been reduced by a fair amount.
- I did all this extra work of sifting through all the updates and
re-integrating everything as a result of missing last month while I ponder
things over.
- I haven't really decided the future of 8.1. It will probably depend how
many people use it. If I don't get that many people using it, I might final
it some time in the future. Popularity really does influence my decisions
for these things.


**Installation instructions**:
-To Upgrade:
1 - Run the exe patch to create the upgrade iso
2 - Mount or burn the iso and navigate to the drive
3 - Run setup.exe and follow the on-screen instructions

-To Fresh Install:
1 - Burn iso to dvd or use dvd-to-usb program
2 - Reboot and change boot settings to appropriate device
3 - Press key on the any key message
4 - Follow directions

To Activate using KMS, download the MTK 2.6b4 using the magnet link in the
torrent directory, run MTK, and select the EZ-Activator option. If you ever
experience a problem with AutoKMS activation, because of an A/V program,
switch to tap-adapter in the settings. It's more friendly with AV programs
than the secohook method.

Credits:
CODYQX4 - MS Toolkit
murphy78 - Testing, ISO design, Integration, Diskpart/Apply script

Enjoy,
murphy78
